definition: festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: March 8th was first celebrated as the International Women's Day in 1975.
sentences.chinese: 1975年，聯合國開始慶祝“三八”國際婦女節。

sentences.english: Today we gather here to grandly celebrate the International Women's Day.
sentences.chinese: 今天我們匯聚一堂，隆重慶祝三八國際婦女節。

sentences.english: Today is International Women's Day and send the best greetings and wishes to all the women.
sentences.chinese: 今天是國際婦女節，向所有的女同胞送去問候和祝福。

sentences.english: In this sense, the International Women's Day not only belongs to women but also to all people of the world.
sentences.chinese: 三八國際婦女節不僅屬於女性，也屬於所有人。

sentences.english: 1911 - International Women's Day is celebrated for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 1911年的今天，第一個國際婦女節。

sentences.english: We celebrate International Women's Day on March 8th.
sentences.chinese: 我們在三月八日慶祝國際婦女節。

definition: Arbor Day (March 12th), also known as National Tree Planting Day 全民義務植樹日|全民义务植树日[Quan2 min2 Yi4 wu4 Zhi2 shu4 ri4]
to take tea and chat/a small-scale informal gathering with tea and snacks
Youth Day (May 4th), PRC national holiday for young people aged 14 to 28, who get half a day off
to swear the oath of office
organizing committee/abbr. to 組委|组委
Hong Kong Federation of Trade Unions

definition: Fenyuan township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
